Variable Polylidar::PL_DEFAULT_DESIRED_VECTOR¶

  • Defined in File Types.hpp

Variable Documentation¶

static constexpr std::array<double, 3> Polylidar::PL_DEFAULT_DESIRED_VECTOR = {0, 0, 1}¶

Planes by default should be aligned with the XY Plane.
